snippet.title: Resident Evil 4 Gold Edition - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Enjoy Resident Evil 4 to its fullest with the base game, Separate Ways story DLC, and an Extra DLC Pack with Resident Evil 4 Gold Edition! The action-packed The Mercenaries mode is also available as a free DLC.

Resident Evil 4 Gold Edition
Release date: Feb. 9, 2024
Platforms: PlayStation®5、PlayStation®4、Xbox Series X|S、Steam
Genre: Survival Horror
No. of Players: 1
Official Site: https://www.residentevil.com/re4/"

'Like' on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/residentevil

Follow on Twitter
http://twitter.com/#!/RE_games
